name: Flapping Bird (Jonas Wahle)
description:
Have fun with my first Unity project!

In Flapping Bird you have to tap the space bar to make the bird flap its wings and fly upwards. You must navigate the bird through a series of pipes by timing the flaps to keep the bird from crashing. The longer you can keep the bird flying, the higher you're score will be. 

The game ends if the bird crashes into a pipe or leaves the screen.

Thank you for playing!
